div.div: The Sisulu-Walker Charter School of Harlem, New York

div.class: sqs-block image-block sqs-block-image sqs-col-3 span-3 float float-left
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: While we navigate these uncharted waters together, please work with us as we strive to continue meeting our citizens’ educational needs during our closure in connection with this national emergency. Please find your citizen’s class and click on the corresponding link below to download remote learning materials. Additional resources and assignments are available on Google Classroom. Don't forget to have your citizen join his/her class using his/her school email and password.

h3.a: kuendelea - KINDERGARTEN (ms. Reyes/ms. tawfik) - remote learning
WEMA - FIRST GRADE (ms. musadeq/ms. travieso) - remote learning
HAKI - SECOND GRADE (ms. paulino/ms. pierce) - remote learning
NIDHAMU - SECOND GRADE (ms. hart/ms. sosa) - remote learning
HUDUMA - third GRADE (ms. manias/mr. harris) - remote learning
OPTIMIS - THIRD GRADE (ms. perten/ ms. zuyeva) - remote learning
KOURAJ - FOURTH GRADE (ms. olympia/mr. knight/ms. williams) - remote learning
HESHIMA - FIFTH GRADE (mrs. wilson/mr. levine) - remote learning
